website_summaries.verdict: Highly-acclaimed home brewing keg with a wide selection of beers that you can modify and customize.
pros: Brews up to 5 liters of a craft beer, or 13, 12-ounce bottles, with a kit that uses all-natural grains and hops ingredients
Choose from beers from more than 180 breweries
Adjust the alcohol content to fit your needs, as well as the bitterness level
cons: Some models have a defective shuttle pump, while the CO2 regulator is not foolproof, creating carbonation problems

website_summaries.verdict: While better and cheaper than previous versions, the Model C still isn't a great fit for casual beer drinkers or aspiring home brewers. It is worth a look if you're willing to spend to try a replica of unique beers from all over the world.
pros: The PicoBrew Pico Model C is the most affordable, simplest beer making robot I've tested
Most of the time, the beer made by the Model C turns out great
cons: The machine still isn't foolproof, so you might infect your beer if you don't have any home brewing experience
The Model C won't teach you to home brew and it's much more complicated than a push button machine like a Keurig

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: First time using it what a joke. Put a picopak in the machine did exactly what the directions said and wants it started brewing walked away and came back 40 min later to a huge mess! It leaked everywhere from the bottom. customer_reviews.title: Good starting place for home brewers but need more options for creating "own brew."
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband for our anniversary. He is big into craft beer and had been considering making his own. He appreciates the ease of it and the first brew went well and the beer was pretty good, at least according to him. The second brew is fermenting now. Biggest downside we see is a lack of real creativity for making brews that are really your own. They have some options, but they are ultimately pretty minimal. We are hoping they make changes in that direction soon.

customer_reviews.title: EASY!
customer_reviews.text: If you like making all grain beer at home AND trying microbrews from around the world then this little brewer is for you! I have made three different brews so far from microbreweries in Seattle and Berlin, Germany. It couldn't have been easier. You simply place the PicoPak for the beer you are making in the brewer and press "Brew PicoPak". Approximately 2 1/2 hours later your beer is ready for fermenting. If you have ever made all grain beer at home then you know how tedious it can be watching times and temperatures and then you have the cleanup. This little brewer takes care of all of that. EASY, EASY, EASY!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: My Pico Brew didn't come with any manuals or instructions ...

customer_reviews.text: What a joke, would not have even given it one star of not for the fact that item was well packaged. The setup instructions though adequate, failed to get system up and running without support (no phone # provided) and after 2 hours, still waiting for someone to email back with solution to my problem. This machine does all the work for you. Just add in the pico paks and let it do its job (2-3 hrs later). I highly recommend downloading the manual and follow the steps, I just keep my laptop open with the pdf file up so its always available. My first batch was finished last weekend and it came out great. I have 3 more batches in process so I get a fresh batch each weekend.

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy way to brew premium beer.
customer_reviews.text: I received my Pico for Christmas and was a little intimidated at first because a friend does home brewing and his setup looked more like an overgrown chemistry experiment. The first batch was an Upslope Brown Ale that turned out fantastic (Even bottled it). I did order a Freestyle and had really no idea what I was doing with the different ingredients. However, there was a guide that changed each time you changed the recipe with a rough guideline what the beer would be like. It was fantastic and my girlfriend loved it too. Only thing I would suggest is including written instructions instead of online (But you can print). But I am old-school.

customer_reviews.title: Warning! Picobrew is out of business!

product_meta.title: PicoBrew Pico C Beer Brewing Appliance 14" x 12" x 16" Black
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Pico Model C

With a Pico Model C in your kitchen or bar, you can brew your own great beer without all of the complex equipment, vessels, sterilization and cleanup. Select from more than 100 PicoPak recipes available on PicoBrew's online BrewMarketplace or craft your own using our Web-based FreeStyle beer crafter. We'll deliver a PicoPak full of fresh grains, hops and yeast to your doorstep and you'll be brewing and proudly sharing kegs of your awesome craft beer before you know it!



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 

$1,927,217 raised with 4,301 backers. 


BREW THE IMPOSSIBLE Pico Model C is an automated craft brewery that brews fresh craft beer using recipes from award-winning breweries. Brew any style of beer you desire – from IPAs to session ales to stouts to porters – starting with just the press of a button. Your beer will be fermented, carbonated, and ready to enjoy in 10-14 days.

ENDLESS BEER The Pico Model C uses ready-to-brew PicoPak ingredient packs that take the guesswork out of homebrewing. PicoPaks include the perfect balance of pre-measured, fresh grains, hops, and yeast so you can brew 5 liter batches of beers from a growing list of award-winning breweries from around the world available online in PicoBrew's BrewMarketplace. 




CUSTOMIZABLE  RFID technology recognizes the biodegradeable PicoPak and optimizes the settings for that recipe once inserted. Modify any PicoPak to your liking by simply adjusting the alcohol percentage (abv) and bittering IBUs. 

CREATE YOUR OWN Making a custom craft beer is as easy as dragging and dropping grains, hops and yeast into a virtual PicoPak on PicoBrew’s Web site. The online FreeStyle beer crafter allows anyone to create a custom PicoPak that is sent to your home.

EXPERTLY ENGINEERED Monitor the automated brewing process with any Web enabled device. Everything you need is included to allow you to ferment, carbonate, and serve fresh craft beer in 10-14 days. PicoPaks are sold separately. 




Pico Model C brings the craft of beer brewing within reach.




About the Startup Describe your product in 3 words.

Beer Brewing Appliance

How did you come up with the idea for this product?

Frustrated with the challenges in reproducibility and time requirements of homebrewing, the PicoBrew team set out to create a line of fully automatic craft beer brewing appliances.

What makes your product special?

Nearly two hunded prominent breweries have developed hundreds of craft beer recipes that can be brewed on the new Pico Model C.

What has been the best part of your startup experience?

The most gratifying company experience for us has been the positive feedback from both craft breweries and customers from around the world. We're excited to get the world brewing!
